locations.title: Our Locations
locations.subtitle: Bonfire brings game developers together in two cities across Czech Republic.

prague.name: Bonfire@Prague
prague.description: Our flagship location in the heart of Czech Republic's capital. Meetups featuring talks from local and international game developers.

zlin.name: Bonfire@Zlin
zlin.description: Bringing the game dev community to Moravia. Regular meetups at UTB university with focus on indie development and student projects.
